pr_title: Replace kscript with jbang for cron job

timeline.bodyText: This was copied from the script we have in Quarkus proper
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: We should move this class to https://github.com/quarkusio/jbang-catalog at some point
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText:
A central shortcut catalog is not suitable for hosting scripts to do releases. You want the release scripts tag/versioned together with your artifacts.
You can add a catalog file to this Repo if you want to simplify its usage but I would highly recommend to not move these scripts to central catalog.
replies.author: maxandersen
